```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
```
```{r}
# Load the file
abtest_online <- readRDS("Causal_Data_Science_Data/abtest_online.rds")
# Create a Data Frame
df=data.frame(abtest_online)
glimpse(df)
```
```{r}
# Use a plot to show covariate balance across groups
ggplot(df, aes(x = chatbot, y = previous_visit, color = mobile_device)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  labs(title = "Covariate Balance Check",
       x = "Group (Control vs Treatment)",
       y = "Number of Previous Visits")
```
